structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Monies Credited To Government Land Bank Fund; Reversion Upon Termination Of Agency
law.text: Upon the termination of the Agencyâ€™s existence, all monies credited to the Government Land Bank Fund shall, after payments, other than the interest on or the principal of any bonds and notes issued pursuant to this chapter, due on account of the Agency shall have been made, revert to the treasury of the commonwealth and shall be used solely toward meeting the debt service obligations of the General Fund.
